body.content: Project Bootstrap automates the tedious setup process for new projects by provisioning cloud resources, configuring pipelines, and setting up repo structureâ€”all from a single YAML file.

body.alt: Architecture diagram showing project bootstrap flow
body.caption: How Project Bootstrap works

body.content: The system has drastically reduced setup time from 3 days to 20 minutes.
Implemented a multi-region load balancing strategy using Azure Front Door to ensure Bunnings applications remain resilient and performant across geographies.
Helps achieve near-zero downtime with auto-failover between primary and secondary regions.
Developed a GenAI assistant using Azure OpenAI and Azure Functions that answers team queries across Confluence and GitHub to boost productivity and onboarding speed.
Built a dashboard that is using a red/amber/green indicator system.
Onboarded and productionized new internal services with observability, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure validation using Terraform and GitLab.
